summary.span: 支持 控件并为数据绑定控件提供一个接口，以便对关系数据库执行 SQL 数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform SQL data operations against relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于数据绑定控件，而不是页代码中的可编程对象。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. ASP.NET 数据源控件包含一个或多个数据列表，由数据源视图对象表示。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 类扩展 类，定义与其关联的控件的功能 ，并实现数据源控件的基本数据功能。The class extends the class, defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 类实现控件的数据功能 ，包括 、 、 和 操作、排序、筛选和管理保存在视图状态中的设置。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 尽管该 对象不是由控件直接向页面开发人员公开的 ，但它的许多属性都是。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers by the control, many of its properties are. 数据源视图执行的最基本操作是使用方法从基础数据库中检索数据 ，该方法将检索 数据项的集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying database using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 类使用 SQL 查询从关系数据库中实现数据检索。The class implements data retrieval from relational databases using SQL queries. 可以对 SQL 查询进行参数化以提高灵活性和安全性。The SQL queries can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 以下数据检索方法、属性和事件由实现 并直接由其 控件向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 对象支持使用 SQL 命令更新关系数据库中的数据。The object supports updating data in a relational database using SQL commands. 可以参数化 SQL 命令以提高灵活性和安全性。The SQL commands can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件（如 和 ）可以配置为使用自动执行更新 ，而其他控件则不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform updates automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 以下更新方法、属性和事件由实现 并直接由其 控件向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 支持向关系数据库中插入新的数据行。The supports inserting new rows of data into a relational database. 可以参数化属性中指定的 SQL 命令， 以提高灵活性和安全性。The SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件（如 和 ）可以配置为使用自动执行插入 ，而其他控件则不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform inserts automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 以下插入方法、属性和事件由实现 并直接由其 控件向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 对象还支持从关系数据库中删除数据。The object also supports deleting data from a relational database. 与其他命令一样，可以将属性中指定的 SQL 命令 参数化，以提高灵活性和安全性。As with other commands, the SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件（如 和 ）可以配置为使用自动执行删除 ，而其他控件则不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform deletes automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 以下 delete 方法、属性和事件由实现 并直接由其 控件向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 当数据检索过程中用于筛选数据的子句为动态时，数据检索功能更强大。Data retrieval is more powerful when the clause that is used to filter the data during data retrieval is dynamic. 换句话说，带有 static WHERE 子句的 SQL 查询并不像 SQL 查询那样灵活和强大，其中 WHERE 子句中的值绑定到可以更改的值，例如在 Web 窗体页上的控件中显示的值。In other words, an SQL query with a static WHERE clause is not as flexible and powerful as an SQL query where the values in the WHERE clause are bound to values that can change, such as values that are displayed in controls on a Web Forms page. 您可以使用 和 属性将动态筛选应用到数据检索，而不是在每次加载页面时重新生成 SQL 查询并设置属性。Instead of rebuilding an SQL query and setting the property on every page load, you can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 这些属性由实现 并由其 控件直接向数据绑定控件和其他调用方公开。These properties are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以通过添加 ORDER BY 子句来对通过控件检索的数据进行排序 ，这会导致数据库在检索数据时执行排序，或在检索数据后对内存中的数据进行排序。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an ORDER BY clause, which causes the database to perform the ordering for you when you retrieve data or by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 通过设置 传递给方法的对象的属性，可以向提供排序表达式 。You can supply a sorting expression to the by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 属性的语法与 属性的语法相同 。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 如果使用存储过程来检索数据，则还可以使用 属性指定一个参数，该参数专用于对存储过程调用的结果进行排序。If you use a stored procedure to retrieve data, you can also use the property to specify a parameter that is used specifically for sorting the results of a stored procedure call. 当多个用户可以同时更改数据库时，可能会发生并发冲突。When more than one user can change the database concurrently, there is the potential for concurrency conflict. 控件通过属性控制并发 。The control has controls concurrency through the property. 此功能是在属性中实现的 。The functionality is implemented in the property. 与许多其他 Web 服务器控件一样， 还实现了 接口，并使用视图状态来跟踪页面请求之间的状态。Like many other Web server controls, the implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 提供和属性的实现，以及 、 和 方法，以便为控件启用视图状态跟踪。Implementations of the and property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由 方法调用，以返回具有指定参数的数据源视图的新实例 `name` 。The constructor is called by the method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 控件 在任何一次只与一个对象相关联，并且始终将该视图命名为 `Table` ，尽管此命名限制由 控件（而不是）施加 。The control is associated with only one object at any one time, and always names the view `Table`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not the . 可以重写 方法，以支持具有不同命名约定的视图。You can override the method to support views with a different naming convention. `context` 数据源视图使用参数传递的对象来访问参数对象，如 和 属性。The object that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter objects, such as the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值指示操作期间基础数据库中的一行数据更改时， 控件如何执行更新和删除。

span.span: Gets or sets the value indicating how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否将旧值和新值的参数应用于 `Update` 方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果属性指定的命令 返回一个 具有列和的对象 `Name` `Number` ，并且 属性设置为 值，则会为 `Name` 更新操作创建和的参数 `Number` 。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the update operation. 如果 将属性设置为 值，则会为、、和创建参数 `Name` `Number` `original_Name` `original_Number` 。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (原始值的参数确切名称是否依赖于 。 ) 然后， 对象确定属性中指定的方法是否 具有匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) Then, the object determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种技术数据存储，用于控制当多个客户端访问和处理相同数据时，如何在存储中读取和更改数据。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并向用户显示数据，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果这两个用户更新数据并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会发生一些意外的结果，因为这两个客户端可能会为同一数据更新不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过将 属性设置为 值，更新操作可以将旧值和新值与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并根据需要对其进行处理。By setting the property to the value, the update operation can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as required. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用于从基础数据库中删除数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 ，它是类的默认提供程序，则 参数的占位符为 `'@parameterName'` 。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为 或，则 参数的占位符为 `'?'` 。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果基础数据库支持存储过程，则可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the underlying database supports stored procedures. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 文本以从 Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 将从 Orders 表中检索数据，并在控件中显示数据 。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 当属性设置为时，将自动呈现 "**删除**" 按钮，并在 `true` 单击 "**删除**" 按钮时自动填充该集合并调用方法。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true` and automatically populates the collection and calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked. 最后，由于此示例删除数据，因此添加了一个事件处理程序，以便在执行删除操作之前尝试将数据库备份到磁盘。Finally, because this example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成删除操作后，处理事件以检查输出参数的值。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a delete operation has completed. 输出参数适用于 与事件关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 sql 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到属性的影响 ; 具体而言，如果名称标识主键（如使用数据绑定控件的属性指定的密钥）， `DataKeyNames` 或在将属性设置为该值的 delete 和 update 方案中，并将 一组 `oldValues` 传递给相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios in which the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串将应用于集合中的每个参数名称 `oldValues` 。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序，集合中参数的顺序 可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序来关联集合中的参数。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它 通过将参数名称与 SQL 查询中的占位符匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 文本以删除 Northwind 数据库中的订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从 Orders 表中检索数据，并在控件中显示数据 。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 使用数据绑定控件（如 (不同于控件）时，必须显式声明属性并调用方法，如 和 ，后者会自动填充参数并 ) 数据源控件上调用方法。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike controls, such as the and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此示例中，将 事件委托给专用 事件处理程序，该处理程序显式调用 控件的方法 。In this example, the event is delegated to the private event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 执行删除操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行其他特定于应用程序的初始化操作，验证参数的值，或者在 控件执行删除操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能 直接通过 对对象公开的对象调用方法来取消操作 。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过将 的属性设置为来取消该操作 `true` 。You can, however, cancel the operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 发生删除操作前引发的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a delete operation occurs. 由于此示例删除 Northwind 数据库中的数据，因此 添加了一个处理程序，以便在执行删除操作之前尝试将数据库备份到磁盘。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承 方法以从数据库中删除数据。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from a database. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不会直接调用 方法; 而是使用公开的 方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 计算集合中包含的值 `keys` 并将其与集合中包含的任何值合并 。The values that are contained in the `keys` collection are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果将 属性设置为值，则会将 集合中包含的值设置为 `oldValues` 属性的格式 ，并且还将合并这些值。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 在执行删除操作之前，将 调用方法来引发 事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在删除之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete. 若要执行删除操作， 对象将 使用 文本和任何关联的属性生成对象 ，然后 对基础数据库执行对象。To perform a delete operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 删除操作完成后， 调用方法来引发 事件。After the delete operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承 方法以从数据库中检索数据。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data from a database. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不会直接调用 方法; 而是使用公开的 方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 在执行数据检索之前，将 调用方法来引发 事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在检索数据之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before data is retrieved. 若要执行此操作， 对象将 使用 文本和任何关联的来生成对象 ，并对基础数据库执行此操作。To perform the operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated , and executes it against the underlying database. 操作完成后， 调用方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值、错误代码以及执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 如果将设置为，则方法将返回 对象; 如果设置为，则返回对象 。The method returns a object if the is set to , or a object if the is set to . 读取完数据后，关闭对象。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 如果将 设置为 并启用了缓存，则会在 数据操作期间从中检索数据并将数据保存到缓存中。If the is set to and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data operation. 根据和属性的组合指定的缓存行为，创建、放弃或刷新缓存 。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 "Windows 身份验证" 下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且您希望数据库的每次检索都由数据库的安全配置进行验证，则不要使用缓存。If you expect multiple users to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the database's security configurations, do not use caching. 如果将 设置为， 并且指定了，则将 与提供的进行计算， 并在数据检索操作过程中将生成的筛选器应用于数据列表。If the is set to and a has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the data retrieval operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置调用 方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 表示使用 方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于属性的语法 是格式字符串样式的语法。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style syntax. 可以在属性中包含参数 。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数的类型为 "字符串" 或 "字符"，则将参数用单引号引起来。If the type of the parameter is string or character, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含为属性中的占位符计算的参数 。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 只有在模式下，控件才支持筛选数据 `DataSet` 。The control supports filtering data only when in `DataSet` mode. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的对象 。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据并对其进行筛选 。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 只要 执行方法来检索数据，就会应用控件的属性。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中， 属性包含一个筛选器参数的占位符，该参数包含在 集合中。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 在此示例中，filter 参数是一个 对象，该对象绑定到 控件的属性 。In this example, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 由于 控件 将其属性设置为，因此所 `true` 选内容中的任何更改 都会导致页面向服务器发送内容，并将 控件重新绑定到带有新筛选器的数据源控件。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Filtering As SqlDataSourceFilteringEventHandler

summary.span: 执行筛选操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a filter operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便在 对象执行筛选器操作之前对筛选器参数值执行验证操作。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the object performs a filter operation. 可以 通过将 对象的属性设置为来取消方法 `true` 。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the object to `true`. 仅当设置了属性时才引发事件 。The event is raised only if the property is set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的对象 。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取与 字符串中的任何参数占位符关联的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders in the string.

value.span: ，它包含与在 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

span.span: A that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的参数 与属性中指定的任何参数相关联 。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 调用方法时，将按顺序计算在中指定的参数占位符，并将其 匹配到集合中的参数对象 。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the are evaluated by order and matched to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的对象 。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据并对其进行筛选 。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 只要 执行方法来检索数据，就会应用控件的属性。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中， 属性包含一个筛选器参数的占位符，该参数包含在 集合中。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，筛选器参数是一个 对象，该对象绑定到 控件的属性 。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 由于 控件 将其属性设置为，因此，所 `true` 选内容中的任何更改都将 导致该页将信息发布回服务器，并将 控件重新绑定到具有新筛选器的数据源控件。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来将数据插入到基础数据库中的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to insert data into the underlying database.

value.span: 插入数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to insert data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 ，它是类的默认提供程序，则 参数的占位符为 `'@parameterName'` 。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为 或，则 参数的占位符为 `'?'` 。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件将数据插入到数据库中 。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，在控件中显示数据 ，并使用 控件以窗体形式查看所选行的详细信息，并将其 作为插入新记录的窗体。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件将数据插入到数据库中 。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 表中的当前数据显示在 控件中。The current data in the table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过在控件中输入值，然后 单击 " **插入** " 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 单击 " **插入** " 按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，并 刷新。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 检索数据，在控件中显示数据 ，并使用 控件以窗体的形式查看所选行的详细信息，并将其 作为插入新记录的窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在 控件中，所选行 还显示在 控件中。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和 控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的控件 具有 和 属性，这确保显示了的选定行 。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击控件的自动生成的 **插入** 按钮 ，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入记录，将 使用绑定列中的值自动填充集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时，可以从任何对象推断正确的参数，并从对象中推断出参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，会在事件处理程序中添加一个附加参数， 用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在将数据插入 到数据库后，将 调用事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并 显式调用控件的方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据，在控件中显示数据 ，并使用 控件以窗体的形式查看所选行的详细信息，并将其 作为插入新记录的窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 控件显示一组数据， 控件显示特定行的详细信息。The control displays a set of data and the control displays the details for a particular row. 如果单击控件的自动生成的 **插入** 按钮 ，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 存储过程名称设置在 属性中，并通过将属性设置为值将其标识为存储过程 。The stored procedure name is set in the property and is identified as a stored procedure by setting the property to the value. 最后，在将数据插入 到数据库后，将 调用事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并 显式调用控件的方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

与关联的控件 具有 和 属性，这确保显示了的选定行 。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击控件的自动生成的 **插入** 按钮 ，则 会显示一个用于插入新记录的不同用户界面。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface that is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入记录，将 使用绑定列中的值自动填充集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时，可以从任何对象推断正确的参数，并从对象中推断出参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，会在事件处理程序中添加一个附加参数， 用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在将数据插入 到数据库后，将 调用事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并 显式调用控件的方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行其他特定于应用程序的初始化操作，验证参数的值，或者在 控件执行插入操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能通过 对对象公开的对象调用方法，直接取消数据库操作 。Therefore, you cannot cancel the database operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过将 的属性设置为来取消数据库操作 `true` 。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，并在控件中显示数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control. 该示例还使用 控件显示中所选行的详细信息 ，并使用窗体来插入新记录。The example also uses a control to display details of the selected row in the , and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在 控件中，所选行 还显示在 控件中。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和 控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的控件 具有 和 属性，这确保显示了的选定行 。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击控件的自动生成的 **插入** 按钮 ，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入记录，将 使用绑定列中的值自动填充集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时，可以从任何对象推断正确的参数，并为对象提供一个参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object, and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，会在事件处理程序中添加一个附加参数， 用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在将数据插入 到数据库后，将 调用事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并 显式调用控件的方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 sql 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序，集合中参数的顺序 可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中的显示顺序来关联集合中的参数。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它 通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名进行匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和简单的 Web 窗体页将数据插入到数据库中。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 表中的当前数据显示在 控件中。The current data in the table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过在控件中输入值，然后 单击 " **插入** " 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 单击 " **插入** " 按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，并 刷新。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法 从方法保存的上一个页请求还原对象的视图状态信息 。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串仅应用于主键，如 `DataKeyNames` 数据绑定控件的属性标识的、删除和更新方案中的 属性设置为值的， 以及将一组 `oldValues` 传递给相应数据方法的。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串将应用于集合中的每个参数名称 `oldValues` 。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据，在控件中显示数据 ，并使用 控件以窗体的形式查看所选行的详细信息，并将其 作为插入新记录的窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在 控件中，所选行 还显示在 控件中。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和 控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的控件 具有 和 属性，这确保显示了的选定行 。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击控件的自动生成的 **插入** 按钮 ，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入记录，将 使用绑定列中的值自动填充集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时，可以从任何对象推断正确的参数，并从对象中推断出参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，会在事件处理程序中添加一个附加参数， 用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在将数据插入 到数据库后，将 调用事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并 显式调用控件的方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从控件中的 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索的数据 ，以及如何使用控件更新记录 。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何在 使用控件更新数据时使用对象添加事务上下文 。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: When overriding the in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取用作参数化 SQL 查询中的参数占位符前缀的字符串。

span.span: Gets the string that is used to prefix a parameter placeholder in a parameterized SQL query.

value.span: “@”字符串。

span.span: The "@" string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL 查询和命令可以参数化，因为它们包含在运行时绑定到查询的值的占位符。SQL queries and commands can be parameterized, in that they contain placeholders for values that are bound to the query at run time. 根据为控件设置的 ADO.NET 提供程序 （由属性标识） ，将按别名或按其在对象中的排序来计算参数 。Depending on the ADO.NET provider that is set for the control, which is identified by the property, the parameters are evaluated by alias or by their ordering in the object. 如果 未设置或设置为，则将 按别名计算参数，并 使用属性将参数前缀添加到中 每个对象的属性（ 在 数据检索或数据操作操作过程中）。If the is not set or is set to the , parameters are evaluated by alias and the property is used to add a parameter prefix to the property of each object in a during a data retrieval or data manipulation operation. 如果将 属性设置为 或 ，则按顺序计算参数，并 忽略和属性。If the property is set to the or , the parameters are evaluated by order and the and properties are ignored. 如果扩展了 类，则可以重写 属性以提供除字符串以外的其他前缀 `"@"` （如果需要）。If you extend the class, you can override the property to supply a prefix other than the `"@"` string, if required.

span.span: Compares the capabilities that are requested for an operation against those that the view supports and is called by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源视图使用方法来检查数据绑定控件所请求的每个功能，这些功能由 传递给方法的对象表示， 并将这些功能与数据源视图所支持的功能进行比较。The method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities that are requested by a data-bound control, which is represented by the object that is passed to the method, and to compare those capabilities to the capabilities that are supported by the data source view. 对于由对象表示的 且不受数据源视图支持的功能，将 引发异常。For the capabilities that are represented by the object and are not supported by the data source view, a exception is raised.

exception.span: 数据源没有启用所选 。

span.span: The data source does not have the selected enabled.

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后 控件的视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象，如果不存在与对象关联的视图状态，则为 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, , if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 这些值自动置于 服务器控件的属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 服务器控件的值随后将保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态后，在服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段后保存的字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML 元素中的变量返回给客户端 `Hidden` 。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save state stage of the server control life cycle is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写 方法并修改服务器控件的属性来提高效率 `ViewState` 。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来从基础数据库检索数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 用来检索数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 ，它是类的默认提供程序，则 参数的占位符为 `'@parameterName'` 。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为 或，则 参数的占位符为 `'?'` 。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用存储过程比对属性使用 SQL 语句更安全 。It is more secure to use a stored procedure than a SQL statement for the property. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将文本设置 为基本的 SQL 查询，以从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并在控件中显示数据 。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 第二个代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为要从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据的存储过程的名称，并将其显示在中 。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a . 下面的代码示例演示如何将文本设置 为基本的 SQL 查询，以从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并在控件中显示数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 和 控件作为一个简单界面提供，用于更新中选定用户的地址 。The and controls are provided as a simple interface to update the address for the selected user in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将文本设置 为从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据的存储过程的名称，并在控件中显示数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 如果数据源支持存储过程，则该属性可以是 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以在数据检索操作完成后检查输出参数的值。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a data retrieval operation has completed. 输出参数适用于 与事件关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 sql 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序，集合中参数的顺序 可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中的显示顺序来关联集合中的参数。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它 通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名进行匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过将 属性设置为 SQL 查询，在 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索 Northwind 数据库中的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. SQL 查询已参数化，并且属性中的占位符与 添加到集合中的对象匹配 。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 这样， 绑定到的控件将 充当控件中显示的内容的筛选器 。In this way, the control, to which the is bound, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 由于参数在 WHERE 子句中使用，因此在 此代码示例中使用属性的功能等效于使用 和 属性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in this code example is functionally equivalent to using both the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来更新基础数据库中的数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: 用来更新数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: A SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 ，它是类的默认提供程序，则 参数的占位符为 `'@parameterName'` 。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为 或，则 参数的占位符为 `'?'` 。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何 使用控件设置控件的属性 和更新 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中的数据 。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用控件更新 ODBC 数据库中的数据 。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用控件设置控件的属性 和更新 SQL Server 数据库中的数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 控件会自动填充 集合，从对象推断参数 ，并在 选择可编辑控件上的 **更新** 链接时调用方法 。The control automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable control is selected. 此示例还包括一些后期处理-更新记录后，将发送电子邮件通知。This example also includes some post-processing - after a record is updated, an email message notification is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上与前面的代码示例相同，演示了如何使用控件更新 ODBC 数据库中的数据 。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 属性设置为 odbc 的 ADO.NET 提供程序， 并且 属性设置为 odbc 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The property is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 完成更新操作后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an update operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便在更新操作完成后检查输出参数的值。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 输出参数适用于 与事件关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和更新从控件中的 ODBC 数据库检索的数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 成功更新记录后，事件 处理程序会处理事件，以执行在其中发送电子邮件通知的后处理步骤。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email message notification is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 属性使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection containing the parameters that are used by the property.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 sql 查询，则 集合包含 与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders that are in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到属性的影响 ; 具体而言，如果名称标识主键（如使用属性指定的密钥）， `DataKeyNames` 或在属性设置为该值的 delete 和 update 方案中 ，并将一组 `oldValues` 传递给相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串将应用于集合中的每个参数名称 `oldValues` 。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序，集合中参数的顺序 可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中的显示顺序来关联集合中的参数。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它 通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名进行匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅 [将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件在控件中显示数据 ，并在单击 " **提交** " 按钮时更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 使用参数化 SQL 语句设置属性，并将两个 参数添加到集合中 。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 单击 " **提交** " 按钮时，将 处理该事件以显式调用 方法。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行其他特定于应用程序的初始化操作，验证参数的值，或者在 控件执行更新操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能直接通过 对对象公开的对象调用方法来取消操作 。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过将 的属性设置为来取消数据库操作 `true` 。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从控件中的 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索的数据 ，以及如何使用控件更新记录 。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何在 使用控件更新数据时使用对象添加事务上下文 。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
